creator: Avatar Maker Factory
descriptionHtml:
Horses have combined everything-grace, intelligence, lively energy, nobility, the desire for freedom... They just can not help but admire! You can look at their photos endlessly. Do you want to create your own unique horse? In this you will help our Avatar Maker: Horses. 💥 You are waiting for a variety of horses and foals of different colors, ponies, as well as the most fantastic creatures-it is, of course, unicorns and Pegasus! You will help a wide personalization with a huge selection of accessories for horses and ponies!
Creating an anime horse avatar with our app is an easy and fun process!
💥 Choose the breed of the horse with the help of different spots and gradients silhouettes in the set;
The degree of its attractiveness and irresistibility depends on the mane, so pay attention to the hairstyle of the horse!
💥 Set a playful mood with a collection of accessories, emotions and stickers in the style of anime!
A large set of wings and horns will give you the opportunity to create a Pegasus or alicorn, and maybe the sweetest pony!
💥 Choose anime Wallpaper from the set in the application or add your own background from the gallery on your phone, or maybe anime Wallpaper is your own photo, then your irresistible stallion will accompany you always!
Save your horse avatar to your phone and show your new horse character to your friends, turn your creativity into a kind of horse games! Share the avatar of the horse and stallion with friends on social networks, set as Wallpaper on your phone or desktop.
Now you can send a friend not only the result of your creativity, but also a video with the process of creating a horse avatar using the screen recording function!
💥 Application Avatar Maker: Horses it is possible as a game dress up for fans of horses, you can change the layers - elements of the collection, when and how you want, it is possible to remove an element of the collection at all, and if today the Muse is not your girlfriend, the function "random avatar" to cope with the task. Your new horse can become a character in a novel or manga, compose, create with Avatar Maker: Horses!
Anime horses for girls and boys are here!
descriptionShort: Create an avatar of horses and wallpaper with the Avatar Maker: Horses 🐎

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: [+] Fixed bugs, improved stability of the application, added new elements to create avatars at your request 👍 We appreciate your opinion, if you liked our application, please rate it and write a review to 💖 Feel free to leave comments, offer your favorite characters you would like to see in the next update to 😃 Good luck with your work!
